Author: Kript.io
Title: Kript - a mobile app for managing crypto assets
Body: Hi everyone,  We are happy to launch our account on Bitcointalk to share with you common threads, updates, and answer any questions you have about our project. But firstly, for those who still don’t know anything about our web portal we created, let us introduce Kript.  Kript is a mobile application designed to assist private crypto investors manage their assets. In simple words Kript is:  Advisory Kript assists you in your investment decision with better information on what and when to buy to provide maximum growth for your portfolio.  Alerts Kript is your 24/7 crypto-adviser that informs you every time it matters.  Social trading tools Track insights and decisions made by top investors and analysts on the platform and track their crypto portfolio and adapt it to your vision.  Assessment Kript gives you personalized insights about the crypto market and the potential of other crypto assets.  Exchange service With Kript you can buy or sell crypto assets from multiple exchanges directly in one app. Anytime, anywhere.  We develop our application for two groups of people:  people who have already invested or plan to invest in cryptocurrencies and related businesses, but they are afraid of the high risks usually associated with the crypto market inexperienced investors who have money but don’t want to spend a lot of time analyzing the market. They need a clear idea of what and when to buy  What is our goal?  The largest issue facing cryptocurrencies is illiquidity. Our goal is to help create a transparent and sustainable liquidity for the markets. We keep the investors better informed and aim to bring additional knowledge, ability, and talent to the markets. In order to create transparency and value in this new economy, we created Kript — a multi- blockchain platform that implements a service function — to assist the investor in making the best trading decision for his portfolio. We create a social trading environment for the investor to make these decisions based on knowledge and understanding.  Our first beta version is already available on: Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.kript App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/ru/app/kript/id1308056569?mt=8  There is only Poloniex linked to the app so far, but in the upcoming weeks we are adding more exchanges and features to the new version. Stay tuned with us! Meantime, if you want to know more about Kript and keep up with the updates, please visit our:  Official website: https://kript.io/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/kriptio Telegram: https://t.me/Kriptio Twitter: https://twitter.com/kriptioapp   We look forward to receiving your questions and having good talks with you about Kript.  Best, Kript team
